code:
class Node:
    def __init__(self, key, value):
        self.key = key
        self.value = value
        self.next = None
        self.prev = None

class HashTable:
    def __init__(self, capacity=8):
        self.capacity = capacity
        self.size = 0
        self.buckets = [None] * capacity

class DoublyLinkedList:
    def __init__(self):
        self.head = Node(None, None)
        self.tail = Node(None, None)
        self.head.next = self.tail
        self.tail.prev = self.head
        self.size = 0

    def add(self, node):
        prev_tail = self.tail.prev
        prev_tail.next = node
        self.tail.prev = node
        node.prev = prev_tail
        node.next = self.tail
        self.size += 1

    def remove(self, node):
        prev_node = node.prev
        next_node = node.next
        prev_node.next = next_node
        next_node.prev = prev_node
        self.size -= 1

class LRUCache:
    def __init__(self, capacity):
        self.capacity = capacity
        self.hash_table = HashTable(capacity)
        self.dll = DoublyLinkedList()

    def get(self, key):
        if key not in self.hash_table.buckets:
            return -1
        node = self.hash_table.buckets[key]
        self.dll.remove(node)
        self.dll.add(node)
        return node.value

    def put(self, key, value):
        if key in self.hash_table.buckets:
            self.dll.remove(self.hash_table.buckets[key])
        node = Node(key, value)
        self.hash_table.buckets[key] = node
        self.dll.add(node)
        if self.dll.size > self.capacity:
            lru_node = self.dll.head.next
            self.dll.remove(lru_node)
            del self.hash_table.buckets[lru_node.key]
